timeline.bodyText:
Need to update the comment as it's a bit incorrect. A prefix in this case is a prefix that will be added to every object created by this instance of segment store in a configured S3 bucket. Using prefix allows sharing the same bucket between different Pravega clusters and also differentiate objects within a bucket created by Pravega from other objects.
Also please mention that the prefix is optional and can be left empty.
